entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VB For Each issue #67134
  • VB incorrectly allows access to a protected constructor from a shared member of a derived class #67130
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generator stops working after file rename #67125
  • Source generators run very unreliably (especially with multi-targeting) #67123
  • Using the discard operator can not be compiled #67121
  • CS7035 should report the bad value #67117

Closed

  • Gold bar: AggregateException in SemanticClassificationBufferTaggerProvider #44395
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in CSharpCodeGenerationService.AddStatementsWorker() with top-level statements #44387
    Backlog
  • Consider removing the rename-dashboard/inline-rename experience #44297
    Backlog
  • Recognize references for `nint` and `nuint` #42988
    Backlog
  • "nameof" expression in lambda expression causes capture #43907
    Backlog
  • Intellisense "Show Items From Unimported Namespaces" Sort Order Leads To Unwanted Using Directives #67081
    17.6 P3
  • Intellisense incorrectly picking up cast #43650
    Backlog
  • Solution Explorer -- View class members Please add sorting by method and field. It is recommended to refer to the implementation of IDEA. See annex #43507
    Backlog
  • Add `Class View` Option to Code Editor #43484
    Backlog
  • TemporaryWorkspace is not disposed after use #43441
    Backlog
  • DefinitionProject should implement IEquatable<DefinitionProject> #43406
    Backlog
  • Code formatting changed when 16.6 Preview 2.1 was installed. #43185
    Backlog
  • IDE1006 false positive in new C# project #43108
    Backlog
  • Completion in Interactive Window should not show "Starting Intellisense" #43096
    Backlog
  • Make ICodeGenerationService and CodeGenerationSymbolFactory public #43056
    Backlog
  • TypeImportCompletionProviderTests.Show_TopLevel_Public_NoImport_InReference hanging #43053
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in GetLanguageProviders #42982
    Backlog
  • "use var" false positive in switch expression #42958
    Backlog
  • Intellisense incorrectly shows Members of Struct which is the parameter of a lambda being passed to a function. #42910
    Backlog
  • ILegacyGlobalOptionsWorkspaceService does not provide an implementation in the workspaces layer #66779
  • intellisense does not fire up when typing generic (extension) "<" without having semicolon/valid expression afterwards - e.g. when adding a new line of code between existing #42908
    Backlog
  • Extract Local Function In Lambda Produces Wrong Function Location #65222
    Backlog
  • Extract base class doesn't remove `sealed` modifier #63929
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve completion results when dotting of lambda parameter #67144
    Area-IDE
  • Switch integration CI to Preview Scout queue #67143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Prevent LegacyGlobalOptionService from GC rooting PreviewWorkspace #67142
    Area-IDE
  • Fix some null annotations on IDynamicFileInfoProvider #67141
    Area-IDE
  • Include parens in crefs when necessary to disambiguate items #67140
    Area-IDE
  • Update patch version for 17.5.2 release #67138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update feature status of "Primary Constructors" #67137
    Area-Compilers
  • Add 'name' to option group #67136
    Area-IDE
  • Allow 'convert to interpolated string' to work in any API, instead of just a whitelisted set. #67135
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Fix extraction inside anonymous function" #67133
    Area-IDE
  • Fix exception when the list only contains a suggestion mode item #67132
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Update Program.cs #67131
    Area-Compilers
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Preserve parent hoisted variables in nested async `catch` #67122
    Area-Compilers
  • Compute TextChange based on syntax instead of text #67120
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #67119
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do not access Workspace.CurrentSolution when cleaning up a code-action's operations. #67116
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Update find-refs to find references to nint/nuint #67139
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Sort unimported items from System.* ahead of other unimported items #67083
    Area-IDE, Next
  • 17.5 port: WithFrozenPartialSemantics freezing linked documents (#66904) #67115
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix completion off of nullable lambda parameter #67128
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make the go-to search result preview-window editable. #67129
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add RequiredCapabilities to WatchHotReloadService.Update #67127
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Clean with authority #66925
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Implement legacy options provider for code actions in workspace layer #66798
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge PrimaryConstructors into Main #67124
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Avoid delegate allocations in IExtensionManagerExtensions #67100
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix VisualStudioSettingsOptionPersister issues and increase test coverage #67064
    Next
  • Address remaining PROTOTYPE comments #67109
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into PrimaryConstructors #67111
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix extraction inside anonymous function #66158
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #67118
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #67114
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use CallStackWindow icon for StackTrace Explorer menu button #67112
    Area-IDE, Next
  • link isexternalinit to avoid errors in O# about missing reference #67106
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Removed "sealed" from base class #64983
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update tests to use raw strings #67059
    Next

Updated

  • Support POSIX environment for build boss #67066
    Community
  • Use extension keyword with modifiers #66919
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Don't show expanded items in certain scenarios #67049
  • Bump Microsoft.ServiceHub.Framework to 4.2.70-beta #67071
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Detect ref assemblies in rebuild #59491
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Push on Restore bug #66864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Do not offer `string` (or other type-keywords) after `ref/readonly` inside namespace member declaration #67097
    Area-IDE
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • Thread cancellationToken instead of capturing it in delegates #67087
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Avoid large object heap allocations in classification #67098
    Area-IDE
  • Delay ref safety analysis of placeholder replacements #67110
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2125195 #67077
  • Update PDB behavior for 'using alias to type', and add EE and PDB tests. #67105
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive
